title: Factors involved in the conversion from video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery decortication to open thoracotomy in non-complicated, non-MDR/XDR stage III tuberculous empyema patients: A retrospective intention-to-treat study
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Dangze Sun, Chao Ding, Liyun Dang, Xiaotong Yue, Weitong Wu, Bei Wang
